name: INActivateCarSignalIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for requesting to activate the car’s signals.

items.name: func resolveCarName(for: INActivateCarSignalIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the name of the user’s car.

items.name: func resolveSignals(for: INActivateCarSignalIntent, with: (INCarSignalOptionsResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the type of signal (audible or visual).

items.name: func confirm(intent: INActivateCarSignalIntent, completion: (INActivateCarSignalIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can activate the car’s signals.
